title: Ash-e-jow (Persian barley soup)
ingredients: ['2L chicken or vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 medium onion, diced', '200g uncooked pearl barley', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 lime, juiced', '4 tablespoons tomato puree', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '2 to 3 carrots, diced', '125ml soured cream', 'good handful chopped fresh parsley', '8 lime wedges']
